email.title: Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
Read on to find out about the £5 Deliveroo vouchers we have coming up for you, a form on CTF and some news from our sponsor Graphcore.
Good luck to everyone sitting exams next week!
email.heading: Free Deliveroo vouchers for all members!
email.text:
We are fortunate enough to be partnering with Deliveroo to give £5 free credit to all of our members on Deliveroo. Whether you’re catching up on coursework, revising for exams or starting to prepare for the Christmas break, you can take a break from work and order online.
You’ll receive a sign up link to claim for your free credit tomorrow morning, starting from Monday 14th of December till Sunday 20th 23:59pm.
email.heading: CTF
email.text:
**TL;DR:** If you're interested in CTFs, then fill out the form at the end.
Have you ever heard about Capture the Flag, or CTF, competitions? No, I'm not talking about CoD's game mode or the outdoor game... If not, then you've been missing out! Now, you'll probably be asking "Well, what are they?" I'm going to answer by quoting an excellent blog post:
"CTF (Capture The Flag) is a kind of information security competition that challenges contestants to solve a variety of tasks ranging from a scavenger hunt on wikipedia to basic programming exercises, to hacking your way into a server to steal data. In these challenges, the contestant is usually asked to find a specific piece of text that may be hidden on the server or behind a webpage. This goal is called the flag, hence the name!" (https://bit.ly/3ozLoqT)
If all these sound interesting, and they should!, then please spare a minute to fill out the form provided below!
https://forms.gle/EmMt8mu9dUvgDgLq8
email.heading: Graphcore News
email.sponsor:
![Graphcore](https://i.imgur.com/bdc44ri.png)
## New AI Performance Standards with MK2 IPU Systems
Check out our [new performance benchmarks](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgNKnW62gX664y0dKhVQ9Y9T14Cw-8V8njgc4b_S8VW2h7qK_3YmrQ5N8Pz1Hym-XrZW5zJPSL2M2PZ3W8fXMfl1hVvzhW322r9Z26wls3W65gSV28Y5RYzW84G6-V24c0vGW20854G2hLVCBW20t_773pf2vqW3Y67V58LnSNrW5LBV7J6RLK-QW2rVlQk8pH5PQMXmg1HbnvqVW4-nkYD8sBqGQW7CRM1n7_Z_5mW35b_zn5lD7f-W4rPJPn5BPVTYW5dzwhc6bBHg5VDsmXT4dd5tgW1Yq7pg2_-bwRW3XrxtB5DNDp135s51) for MK2 IPU-based machine intelligence systems. There are significant performance improvements with the Graphcore IPU-M2000 across the board and for some models orders of magnitude greater.
You can find the code on [GitHub](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgLC9W4NLMtQ4dH-HRW3mNd2s5K4rWWW4cFz5l8CWVlrN6FVhGfBVrHLW3LLqMX2FWypbV60JhF4C4JbcN5F2f7HQds4pW3c8MZc1Hp2t9W4dFsp18TrVQJW8sb6Ww4gwlqNW7yPGWQ2L7s3mW4nDxRP11sTh2N5mTZlTSvFgrW5MTlzH73SjP9W4r3nkx2JdTLpW60nt0p9c0RtDW8zf9rH3w3kPrN4CP_lYDyYC4W1VSvb3987zz6N9k04ZyLytxCMfLGsktD4-xW3wfrW98RPQfhW8Tq_776LfQ-WW3FKG2H1B4gNw3qbg1) and more performance data in the results table on our website [here](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgPK2W46Zv9C12g-4RW2_GBBM6drt_WW3Pfmhw7bKtg_W7-z1K61j5rZ9W6FxM3y5Cm_LsW1nVSQV81HDsLW5tNP7D4n8g5vW6YJ-NB4jMfCGW6R82485WwNYkW53xyG88P_zggW2X4mPl54fznPW2tzGd27mcqK9Vw6Qt42jVYKzN6QpS4h9X1TqW8vj6d43FLqC_W7Kff304h33k1W6PNZTf7KmH33W4qsLVH1RDHmWN5j38ZdGspgdW2CnPNY6lPy10W6hBnGS19h7bZN1YY6C1bPwL1N3DhDvHlzHYMW7qtH-G6xTq_p3mpS1).
[Read the MK2 IPU benchmarks blog](https://www.graphcore.ai/posts/graphcore-sets-new-ai-performance-standards-with-mk2-ipu-systems?utm_campaign=September%20Newsletter&utm_medium=email&_hsmi=102412626&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9t3-kzOSei6MzWNky64TjYJ8_TZBmEohym-hfvIn99lyF6fxRCIuF-wQG7aFCK7tbhJAT2K6iLpH6xqLpJ1_RZ7guqTahSMnJAMqp7zaQqvc7P3js&utm_content=102412626&utm_source=hs_email)
## Introducing PyTorch for the IPU
Today we are introducing our first production release of PyTorch for IPU - [PopTorch](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgXFyW7dGctr29vmvZW7h7Hs26T16ZXN7pc4hLx96v0VzgHNs7XWF16W3vT7SN1JjMfsN4WN_nLJQd_fV4CWDd8NDthSN7gQgx1lBT1JW5lvV5j8188TJW5_-tD71bcwytW1fLTQM5Sw4hcW2FmLnr5MWhF9W49BJJk6H44TYN6dGKkMZ1wC0W3gCf-85sG2t3W1qDPR35w59QYW2YclLd4rmqS7W1DGGBT7DymQ3W8nphrt7kG71NW6GMy9y6wZb3GW6SKP7d8g39ChW2txB4J3PPxR8W8TcK-R7VtV0PW1MKLjz277Kkd3f8w1), combining the performance of the Graphcore IPU-M2000 system and the developer-ready accessibility of PyTorch as part of our new Poplar SDK 1.4.
This allows the fast-growing PyTorch developer community to make new breakthroughs in machine intelligence with Graphcore IPU systems, while maintaining the dynamic PyTorch experience.
Check out our [Developer portal](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgS3DW4nmkSh5QYBmWW6Y1RXH5RBk6CW17-vrD85NhbzW6wk60557fdV_W6vxpF13Qf6LVW4tt46Y1QDjshW6cknFZ8QfQy3VZ8f-Q2ChdV0W4rS93P2pkzg4W52k6-55VPh5VW6zVy2B6ztklbW3B5K9W1Kc0PjW7RFHtx7RSR57N7CnWkMXFVCsW2z1gYf6cJHCjW6-CyJx5lRnmcV5t-kX3smq7YW4plKLs7x90p3W6pclFH60VD4CN7r7pJfNjrnyN2M9w7qcDdgVM5TVcBCz35vW19wcR18sZddJW42-K8p2-s-x532wQ1) and [GitHub](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRFX3p_8SV1-WJV7CgLbCW85THR18l0jr-N5M6fNFqJHMvW1yk3xH8Cdr9mW7WHr5F62BPJwW64GpD29bXP1CW1sMgtg19vfQsN18GprwpF_2PW4rR-j83yhXkCV6mDmw7jw4MgW3pk8j56s3rDDW2Z4wy_9d51d0W9cj0n88TJ2_0W7220cg3vM6vDW7RyZ6l61p43-MZf28Jp72kMN1z_dY4CzvtQW48G83p3_Wd__W6F7knq5G1vgLW88vMD57-80QCW2YqH5s5Q77cDW6f13hl8Sldn_N5x4yc3XRpWJ34fK1) for new code examples, tutorials, docs and developer videos. Read our [blog](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGQ3p_9LV1-WJV7CgJ0HW2SMMRS6YhdVjW3X1wk04nGK9LV6RH8q41M7vbW2YhJTs2vB7cYW50P-Rv2P9Q4LW2K-Dmz77f1BbW1fPZRd7Yd7lFW4Y2zYd3r9rPRW1JLLGY3gX2X6V6-9n31WNfFQW4k70V01p6Q0XW8NpqWW25rG3gW2g6ncx4vSp2tVkxclF5dgvZNW58GHC05fhzywW14hYYK6YtjMxW5zzbZ_5_f0skW5T52Jf2jqDFQW4DYDz93mNBYkW108bdQ7Flc1jW2LSs031_PlZDVKsm5D3xVnw0W2Y0Tx27MHM0cW6_-ms23pZf9sW3DrFZ-5vSKkYW87qbmB2PMK3ZV-V_644SR2GkW5VnJ-S2Mjdr836XF1) or check out our guest post on the PyTorch blog below.
[Read the announcement on the PyTorch Medium blog](https://medium.com/pytorch/graphcore-announces-production-release-of-pytorch-for-ipu-f1a846de1a2f)
## Scaleable, Flexible, Powerful AI With IPU-POD
We're already taking orders and shipping IPU-M2000, IPU-POD16 and IPU-POD64 systems to customers via our global channel partners.
Find your local channel partner [here](https://www.graphcore.ai/e2t/tc/VVQ1s7621RMNW1XRqh452N-CNW95j2m74knH7BN8_nRGc3p_97V1-WJV7CgYMwW2MTQqr12j9qMW39lDpM5nKr-nW4yZMhm34wz3sN8q36VmCzY0sW23GXVK3V6vTfW8hzwpR3bw7JYVvhXVt9lmfzLN1nBrLn9rTBVW2S-njq3S2KjfW6S--7Z8w8FC8F6Dn-rNdDqkW6yWt-f8zZQRpW6KpQqg4FhsDMW82rJ486_DcrxW5s_1WR31B0zLW12L_pp8B3fCRW1q2pS-6mdQzkW5zlHQ-2_2XX8W4pF55b6Qb6XdW6kqqLD7wd9NgW7zp_pC4L66NzW7zXXxh3q72tSVmfXcV6hPBTfVd0Dtz41JF3w3fcf10) or speak to one of Graphcore's AI experts about building your own AI datacenter of the future with scaleable IPU-POD systems.
[Buy Now](https://www.graphcore.ai/getstarted?utm_campaign=September%20Newsletter&utm_medium=email&_hsmi=102412626&_hsenc=p2ANqtz--YnIy8rDr1Mb2ZGo9jo7RTcjFj1AjMciyJLu5db1_UizOL0-7lmbfokkcAgTh2VV3V53hkneIoKWq_s_EMCn-11_lmckMaWBeuETtu8Jc0x3nIZcI&utm_content=102412626&utm_source=hs_email)
